storageInstructions.title: Storage Instructions
storageInstructions.part2: in a cool, dry place. For best results, keep refrigerated and consume within a few days of purchase.

usageSuggestions.title: Usage Suggestions
usageSuggestions.bullet1: Perfect for Salads: Add a fresh, crisp texture to your favorite salad mix.
usageSuggestions.bullet2: Great for Cooking: Enhances the flavor of your soups, stews,and stir-fries.
usageSuggestions.bullet3: Healthy Snacking: Enjoy as a fresh, low-calorie snack any timeof the day.

features.title: Key Features
features.bullet1: Freshness Guaranteed: Harvested at the peak of ripeness toensure the best flavor and texture.
features.bullet2: Nutrient-Rich: Packed with vitamins, minerals, andantioxidants that contribute to your overall well-being.
features.bullet3: Versatile Ingredient: Ideal for a variety of dishes, fromhearty salads and soups to delicious main courses and sidedishes.
features.bullet4: Ethically Sourced: Responsibly grown with a focus onsustainability and fair trade practices.
